title: Entrepreneurial Internship (m/f)
description:
SponsorPay is the European market leader in the field of virtual currency monetization for online games, social apps, virtual worlds and social networks. We are a rapidly growing, VC-backed startup with headquarters in Berlin and satellite offices in San Francisco, Paris and London.

Do you want the ultimate entrepreneurial experience? Are you ready to face the exciting challenges involved with working in the dynamic environment of an internet start-up? Are you a passionate, entrepreneurial and outstanding personality? Do you want to help develop and drive the business of one of the most promising internet start-ups in Europe?
Then join SponsorPay as Entrepreneurial Intern and get the ultimate entrepreneurial experience!

*Role*:
As entrepreneurial intern you will join SponsorPay for at least 6 months. You will gain experience at a rapidly growing start-up and gain unique insights into most aspects of our business.

Among other things you will: Entrepreneurial manage your own projects and bring in new ideas to make the company better every day Conduct various analyses and research tasks for the management of SponsorPay

*Requirements*: 
* Attention to detail, excellent analytical and problem solving skills 
* Very good communication skills Fluent in English, any other European language is a plus 
* Proactive, goal-oriented approach, self-sustained and tenacious working style 
* Experience in the online gaming or performance marketing industry is a plus

*What we offer*: 
* Working environment in which your contribution can, and will, make the difference 
* Competitive remuneration package 
* Fun place to work, located in the heart of one of Europe’s most vibrant capitals

Are you interested in joining our young and creative team? Email us at jobs@sponsorpay.com!
Learn more at www.sponsorpay.com.
